nodes.text: P'Lor was a small, bald, human cyborg.

P'Lor worked on the Bazarre space station as a lookout for weapons dealer, Orion Ferret. He possessed bionic implants similar in design to those used by the Cloud City denizen, Lobot. P'Lor conspired with Ferret on a failed attempt to assassinate Luke Skywalker and Lando Calrissian.
